summary: REQ-20/21/22 appear implemented: ArduinoCodeSection now contains a DHT11 (pin 6) + relay (pin 8 active-LOW) + LED (pin 12) sketch with fanState memory, 27째C ON / 26째C OFF hysteresis, and delay(2000); user-facing text/badges describe the same in English; siteConfig.temperatureThresholdC is set to 27 and marketing copy reflects 27/26 hysteresis. Additional unrequested updates were made to other sections and project metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated the User Manual section wiring/operation copy (pins and active-LOW relay notes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update ArduinoCodeSection.tsx text/code and siteConfig.ts; it did not request changes to ManualSection.tsx.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed the Interactive Simulation (ThresholdDiagramSection) to hardcode hysteresis logic (ON at 27째C, OFF at 26째C) and manage fanState with useEffect.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-20/21/22; requirement scope is ArduinoCodeSection.tsx and siteConfig.ts only.

hallucinated_features.description: Project documentation/state metadata references a new/expanded 'PracticalApplicationsSection' and other unrelated section/navigation changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the BuildRequest (which is limited to updating the Arduino Code section and siteConfig). The diff evidence shows these claims in metadata, not in requested files.
